# allJoints

**Instance Property**

All of the joints in a hand skeleton.

## Declaration

```swift
var allJoints: [HandSkeleton.Joint] { get }
```

## Inspecting hand skeletons

- **neutralPose**: A hand pose that you can use as a reference.
- **description**: A textual representation of this Skeleton.
